sac.stats

Class StatsBarChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • sac.stats.StatsBarChart

  • public class StatsBarChart
extends java.lang.Object
    Bar chart related to statistics object (charts are generated by jfreechart software, http://www.jfree.org/jfreechart/).
    Author:
    Przemysław Klęsk (wi.zut.edu.pl), Marcin Korzeń (wi.zut.edu.pl)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StatsBarChart(Stats stats, java.lang.String plotLabel, java.lang.String xAxisLabel, java.lang.String yAxisLabel)
      Creates a new instance of StatsBarChart.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void saveAsJPEG(java.lang.String filePath)
      Saves this bar chart as a JPEG file of default width and height and under given location.
      void saveAsJPEG(java.lang.String filePath, int width, int height)
      Saves this bar chart as a JPEG file of wanted width and height, and under given location.
      void setHeight(int height)
      Sets height of this bar chart.
      StatsBarChart setValue(java.lang.String subcategoryLabel, java.lang.String categoryLabel, StatsOperationType operationType, java.lang.String category, java.lang.Object... multiIndexPattern)
      Calculates and adds a labeled value to this bar chart, and returns the reference to it.

      Sets width of this bar chart.

             java.lang.String plotLabel,
             java.lang.String xAxisLabel,
             java.lang.String yAxisLabel)
        Creates a new instance of StatsBarChart.
        Parameters:
        stats - reference to statistics object
        plotLabel - wanted plot label
        xAxisLabel - wanted x axis label
        yAxisLabel - wanted y axis label

    • Method Detail

      • setValue

        public StatsBarChart setValue(java.lang.String subcategoryLabel,
                     java.lang.String categoryLabel,
                     StatsOperationType operationType,
                     java.lang.String category,
                     java.lang.Object... multiIndexPattern)
        Calculates and adds a labeled value to this bar chart, and returns the reference to it.
        Parameters:
        subcategoryLabel - imposed subcategory label
        categoryLabel - category label
        operationType - type of operation
        category - category as string
        multiIndexPattern - multi index pattern (may contain nulls)
        Returns:
        reference to bar chart with a new value added to it

      • saveAsJPEG

        public void saveAsJPEG(java.lang.String filePath,
              int width,
              int height)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Saves this bar chart as a JPEG file of wanted width and height, and under given location.
        Parameters:
        filePath - wanted location
        width - chart width
        height - chart height
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when something related to file operations goes wrong
